verbs.description: [V: is] it [ARG2: too hot] [ARG1: for school] [ARGM-TMP: in august] [ARGM-TMP: when should classes start a state senate committee considering when georgia schools resume after summer break discussed air conditioning testing and teen jobs] but the real issue is whether the school calendar should be determined at the local or state level attorney jack hill senate pta gold dome professional association of georgia educators sen rep steve gooch georgia association of educators charlotte booker cobb county association of educators representative sen john wilkinson president atlanta department of education matthew pence school georgia rep steve gooch diane jacobi doe sen john wilkinson georgia pta connie jackson
